comments: Prof gives you a zero if your 2 words short on discussion board wording requirement. Not prompt on grading. Requirements on what days to participate on discussion boards. Strict on how you answer questions and respond to classmates. Study guide for exams does not help at all. I advise students to look into other professors for this course.

comments: HE IS AWESOME! I\'ve taken him for more than one class and I have got to say, his personality and likability makes his students more motivated to learn. His exams and quizzes are straightforward IF you do the readings. Lectures are the best part of this class. The final paper is simple if you have taken any WI course before.

comments: Taken as a hybrid. Weekly: post 1 org post of 150 wrds and 1 resp post of 50 wds. Easy quiz when we met (total of 6 times) the rest was online. The midterm was online and the final was in person. Oh and a group project. He\'s a nice professor. Definitely take him!! You will end up with a good grade.
